pageContent: Background: Smaller prostates have been linked to unfavorable clinical characteristics and poor short-term outcomes following radical prostatectomy (RP). We examined the relation between prostate weight at RP and prostate cancer (PC) outcomes post-RP.

metaData.source:
Finding more meaning: the antecedents of uncertainty revisited
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16000100/
